Text:
i think its always good to put Slade's music up for people who've not heard them,at one point they were 2nd behind the Beatles for having the most top 10 hits in the uk,
good old Slade, great live act too, in the days when if you were in a band you had to be a musician, these days . . oh dear 'i'd better not go into one !!!  good on ya xx
